message:
I’ve implemented and validated the `probing` function in `main.py`. It now correctly trains a logistic regression classifier on each layer’s hidden states, computes accuracy, binary F1-score, and ROC AUC, and returns these metrics per layer. All unit tests pass.

Let me know if you have any further requests!
